column4: im having some problems with "make"... i've installed ubuntu from scratch from the command line, but i take it i've missed something out
make: *** /lib/modules/2.6.28-11-generic/build: No such file or directory. Stop.
what are you compiling from source?
my sound blaster drivers (you know, the ones that make your $70 sound card sound like something from the 80's)
